content: China gross order volume for fiscal year Q1 was $16.3 million, representing 139% growth versus prior year and we generated revenue of $25.5 million which represented year-on-year growth of 732%. Total revenue for the first quarter was $107.4 million, up 26% compared to the prior year, led by strong year-over-year growth in Americas and China. As such, as we previously announced in our preliminary results for the first quarter of fiscal 2022, we are updating our expected revenue guidance to the $420 million to $427 million range, with the midpoint of that range representing 7% year-on-year growth versus FY '21.
